      public void searchUpcomingAppointments​(int user_id)
      Searches for user appointments that are within 15 minutes of the login time
      Parameters:
      user_id - the user id of the user

      Parameters:

    • filterAppointmentsByMonth

      public void filterAppointmentsByMonth()
      Filters the list of appointments based on the month

    • filterAppointmentsByWeek

      public void filterAppointmentsByWeek()
      Calculates the number of front and back-facing days from the past Sunday to the next Sunday. It filters the appointments within that window. LAMBDA The lambda expression here helped eliminate 7 if-statements and presents a more concise way of calculating the number of days in question.

    • filterPerSelection

      public void filterPerSelection()
      The radioButton listens for any selection changes and filters the table based on all, week, or month.

    • openReportsByContacts

    • deleteCustomer

      public void deleteCustomer​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Deletes a customer from the customer table. Alerts the user if the selected customer has associated appointments and prompts confirmation If yes, deletes the customer's associated appointments before deleting the customer
      Parameters:
      event - when the delete button is fired

    • deleteAppointment

      Parameters:
      customer_id - the customer id
      Returns:
      false if deletion fails

      Returns:

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Populates the tables with its corresponding columns and data from the data store. The radioButton from the appointments table listens for any selection changes. Initiates the search for any upcoming appointments the user has within 15 minutes of logging in. Populates the month and type comboBoxes in the Reports pane. Sets system language back to English so table labels are not affected.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.
